turns.content:
You are expert of generate text prompts for an generate image AI model. Please create 5 image prompts based on the following 2 prompts: "Photo of 20 years girl , LEDs visor helmet, profile pose, bust shot, high detail, studio, black background, smoke, sharp, cyberpunk, 85mm Sigma Art lens" 

"longer hair, identical picture, smaller nose, smaller mouth, beautiful girl, soft skin, proportionate body parts, small shoulders, big breasts"

Sure, here are 5 image prompts based on the provided prompts:

1. A cyberpunk-themed portrait of a beautiful 20-year-old girl wearing a futuristic LED visor helmet. The photo is taken in a studio with a black background, and the girl is posing in profile, with smoke in the background adding a mysterious atmosphere. The shot is a bust shot taken with an 85mm Sigma Art lens, ensuring high detail and sharpness.
2. A close-up shot of the beautiful 20-year-old girl from the previous prompt, but with longer hair and a smaller nose and mouth. Her soft skin is emphasized in the photo, which is taken with a high-end camera and lens, showcasing all the details of her features. Her body parts are proportionate, with small shoulders and big breasts, giving her a stunning silhouette.
3. A cyberpunk-inspired portrait of a beautiful girl in her early 20s, wearing an LED visor helmet that illuminates her face. She is posing in profile against a black background, with smoke adding a dramatic touch to the photo. The shot is a bust shot, taken with a high-end camera and lens, ensuring sharpness and high detail. The girl has a beautiful face, with a small nose and mouth, and long hair cascading down her back.
4. A portrait of a young woman in her early 20s, shot in a studio against a black background. She is wearing a futuristic LED visor helmet that adds a cyberpunk feel to the photo. The girl is posing in profile, with smoke in the background adding a mysterious atmosphere to the shot. The photo is taken with a high-end camera and lens, ensuring high detail and sharpness.
5. An identical picture of the 20-year-old girl from the first prompt, but with a different focus on her features. Her nose and mouth are smaller, and her hair is longer, giving her a different look. Her body parts are proportionate, with small shoulders and big breasts, giving her a stunning silhouette. The photo is taken with a high-end camera and lens, showcasing all the details of her features and emphasizing her soft skin.
